description: Main FastAPI application setup and route definitions for user registration and login, health check endpoint, and middleware configuration in a Tic Tac Toe backend.

classes.name: User
classes.description: User ORM model representing application users, imported from the database module.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Basic health check endpoint that returns a simple message indicating the API is running.

methods.name: register_user(user: UserCreate = Body(...), db: Session = Depends(get_session_factory()))
methods.description: Endpoint to register a new user, handling username/email uniqueness and storing user info with hashed password.

methods.name: login_user(login: UserLogin = Body(...), db: Session = Depends(get_session_factory()))
methods.description: Endpoint to authenticate an existing user and generate a JWT token for session management.

ctags.name: login_user
ctags.pattern: /^def login_user(login: UserLogin = Body(...), db: Session = Depends(get_session_factory())):$/

ctags.name: register_user
ctags.pattern: /^def register_user(user: UserCreate = Body(...), db: Session = Depends(get_session_factory())):$/
